contents:
My First Blog Post This is my first blog post on my new Hugo site!
Here’s some more text for the blog post. You can write as much as you want here, and use Markdown syntax for formatting.
A Subheading Under this subheading, I’ll list some things:
Thing 1 Thing 2 Thing 3 That’s it for now!
title: My First Blog Post
